description: Punch Drunk is, for the most part, a sports podcast. Sure we will get off subject and discuss which UFC fighter you least want to walk in on banging your girlfriend. But its a sports podcast with 3 headlining stand-up comics and sometimes friends. Ari Shaffir, Sam Tripoli, and Jayson Thibault all met at the Comedy Store and have been friends for over 10 years. This podcast is their sports thoughts, arguments, stories, fights and bets! The Podcast Tribune called Punch Drunk "An Asian Massage for the Real Sports Fan!"
title: Punch Drunk Sports
